name: multiplayer-game
description: 1. Make a new folder called multiplayer-game 2. Open CMD 3. Type `cd Desktop\multiplayer-game` 4. Type `npm init` to tell the directory that it is a node project 5. Type `npm install --save socket.io express http` in order to install necessary project libraries 6. Open the file in sublime (Go to file > open folder) 7. Make a new file called `server.js` 8. Include the libraries using the `require()` function ```javascript var express = require('express') var socketio = require('socket.io') ``` 9. Now we've got to run the application ```javascript var app = express() var http = require('http').Server(app)
